column4: i have a question for anyone that can solve this complex trivia....all my internet applications (limewire, gaim, irssi...etc) work just fine EXCEPT mozilla firefox...i find i have to disable and enable the lan connection on the host computer (winblows machine) for web browsing to work...this is on all computers on the network not just nix machines
so its not the os its the connection between the computers and the sharing
please if you dont know what your talking about please just keep quiet
can you ping using dns names before you disable/enable?
when i ping...it only returns one ping
I have had problems with ipv6 in firefox but this seems unrelated..this is accross win and unix machines?
it has nix on the box...but i use windows since its my sisters computer and she is computer illeterate
i use the router to connect to my laptop...and my laptop ddials up and everything is just fine web browsing pinging and all
does this happen only when it goes from your sister using windows to you booting *nx or vis-versa?
other words if it is windows and you reboot do you have the problem
